airflow.hooks.presto_hook¶

Module Contents¶

exception airflow.hooks.presto_hook.PrestoException[소스]¶

Bases:Exception

class airflow.hooks.presto_hook.PrestoHook[소스]¶

Bases:airflow.hooks.dbapi_hook.DbApiHook

Interact with Presto through PyHive!

>>> ph = PrestoHook()
>>> sql = "SELECT count(1) AS num FROM airflow.static_babynames"
>>> ph.get_records(sql)

get_first(self, hql, parameters=None)[소스]¶

Returns only the first row, regardless of how many rows the query returns.

get_pandas_df(self, hql, parameters=None)[소스]¶

Get a pandas dataframe from a sql query.

run(self, hql, parameters=None)[소스]¶

Execute the statement against Presto. Can be used to create views.

insert_rows(self, table, rows, target_fields=None)[소스]¶

A generic way to insert a set of tuples into a table.

매개 변수:
  • table (str) -- Name of the target table
  • rows (iterable of tuples) -- The rows to insert into the table
  • target_fields (iterable of strings) -- The names of the columns to fill in the table
